description.raw:
We will move to use the ign-math library in Gazebo6. This is the first pull request along this trajectory.

A `libignition-math2-dev` debian is available.

**Things to note**

1. ign-math is now required
1. gazebo math is still available. The internal library will be deprecated in gazebo7, and removed in gazebo8.
1. There will a lot of files that get touched. I'll make many small pull requests, with this one being the largest.
1. Users will be affected. We follow the tick-tock model, so they will have plenty of time to migrate their code. 
    1. A migration tutorial will be created in the near future to help people transition.
    1. Examples will be added, as shown in this pull request.
1. We can also look forward to a migration of gazebo's transport system to ign-transport. 

** New Jenkins Builds**

[Nvidia](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/172/)

[No gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/228/)


** Update (05/18) **

1. Updated [Windows install tutorial](#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/pull-request/218)
1. New jenkins builds are in the queue
    1. [Homebrew clean](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/191/)
    1. [Nvidia clean ](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/212//)
    2. [no-gpu clean](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/277/)
1. This branch compiles and runs on Windows.

**Update (6/3/15)**

1. [Homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/233/)
1. [No gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/325/)
1. [Nvidia](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/249/)
1. Everything still runs on Windows.

** Update (6/8/15)**

1. [No gpu clean](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/329/)
1. [Nvidia clean](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/253/)
1. [Homebrew clean](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/237/warnings7Result/new/package.-602053952/)
description.html:
We will move to use the ign-math library in Gazebo6. This is the first pull request along this trajectory.

A libignition-math2-dev debian is available.

Things to note

  1. ign-math is now required
  2. gazebo math is still available. The internal library will be deprecated in gazebo7, and removed in gazebo8.
  3. There will a lot of files that get touched. I'll make many small pull requests, with this one being the largest.
  4. Users will be affected. We follow the tick-tock model, so they will have plenty of time to migrate their code.
    1. A migration tutorial will be created in the near future to help people transition.
    2. Examples will be added, as shown in this pull request.
  5. We can also look forward to a migration of gazebo's transport system to ign-transport.

New Jenkins Builds

Nvidia

No gpu

Update (05/18)

  1. Updated Windows install tutorial
  2. New jenkins builds are in the queue
    1. Homebrew clean
    2. Nvidia clean
    3. no-gpu clean
  3. This branch compiles and runs on Windows.

Update (6/3/15)

  1. Homebrew
  2. No gpu
  3. Nvidia
  4. Everything still runs on Windows.

Update (6/8/15)

  1. No gpu clean
  2. Nvidia clean
  3. Homebrew clean
